create_code.description: Generate code in a specified programming language based on instructions.

props.name: text
props.description: Describe what you want the code to do (e.g., "Create a function to sort an array")

props.name: mode
props.description: Select the programming language for code generation

props.name: model
props.description: The language model to use

props.name: max_tokens
props.description: Maximum length of generated code (1-4096 tokens)

props.name: temperature
props.description: Controls creativity (0.0-2.0). Higher values = more creative, lower = more focused.

props.name: n
props.description: How many code snippets to generate (1-5)

create_email.description: Compose an email using context, recipient ("To"), and sender ("From") metadata.

props.name: context
props.description: Context of the email. For example, a summary, or a bullet point list

props.name: mode
props.description: The style or tone to be used when writing

props.name: to
props.description: The recipient of the email

props.name: from
props.description: The sender of the email

props.name: instructions
props.description: Instructions for the email. Available when mode = reply

props.name: received_email
props.description: The email that is being replied to. Available when mode = reply

props.name: purpose
props.description: Purpose of the email. Available when mode = cold

props.name: company_details
props.description: Details regarding the company. Available when mode = customer_support

props.name: model
props.description: The language model to use

props.name: formality
props.description: The formality of the generated text

props.name: source_lang
props.description: The language of the source text

props.name: target_lang
props.description: The language for the email

props.name: max_tokens
props.description: Maximum length of email (1-4096 tokens)

props.name: temperature
props.description: Controls creativity (0.0-2.0). Higher values = more creative, lower = more focused.

props.name: n
props.description: How many email drafts to generate (1-5)
